body_html: The only sampling-specific method in the API is tf.contrib.data.rejection_resample(). If that doesn't work for your application, can you specify what sampling operation you'd like? Like rejection_resample() it may be possible to build it out of existing parts, like Dataset.filter() and tf.contrib.data.scan().
body_text: The only sampling-specific method in the API is tf.contrib.data.rejection_resample(). If that doesn't work for your application, can you specify what sampling operation you'd like? Like rejection_resample() it may be possible to build it out of existing parts, like Dataset.filter() and tf.contrib.data.scan().
body: The only sampling-specific method in the API is [`tf.contrib.data.rejection_resample()`](https://www.tensorflow.org/api_docs/python/tf/contrib/data/rejection_resample). If that doesn't work for your application, can you specify what sampling operation you'd like? Like `rejection_resample()` it may be possible to build it out of existing parts, like `Dataset.filter()` and `tf.contrib.data.scan()`.
